select.foreach: select (select realname from wk_admin_user where user_id = ${x}) as realname, count(a.customer_id) as customerNum, count(if(deal_status ='1',1,null)) as dealCustomerNum, (select IFNULL(SUM(money),0) from wk_crm_contract where DATE_FORMAT(order_date,'${sqlDateFormat}') between #{beginTime} and #{finalTime} and owner_user_id = ${x} and check_status = 1 ) as contractMoney, (select IFNULL(SUM(money),0) from wk_crm_receivables where DATE_FORMAT(return_time,'${sqlDateFormat}') between #{beginTime} and #{finalTime} and owner_user_id = ${x} and check_status = 1 ) as receivablesMoney from wk_crm_customer as a where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'${sqlDateFormat}') between #{beginTime} and #{finalTime} and owner_user_id = ${x} and a.status != 3

#{item}
